text: Georges Gruillot (14 August 1931 – 7 March 2021) was a French politician. Gruillot became a Senator from Doubs on 4 September 1988 for the National Assembly. He was a member of the Rally for the Republic. He retired in 2008. Gruillot died on 7 March 2021 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:Doubs
title: Georges Gruillot
